group_1.textRight: Sayaka, that’s the ticket you wanted,@isn’t it?

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah…but, well…
I didn’t think it would be a couple’s@ticket…

group_1.textRight: Huh, is a couple's one no good?

group_1.textLeft: I-I mean yeah, giving a couple’s ticket as a@gift, something like that would…
Look like…@[chara:200450:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200450:cheek_1][chara:200450:motion_300][chara:200450:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:200450:lipSynch_1]that, with me and him…
(It’d look like I’m telling him to go there@with me, wouldn’t it…?!)
What is it, Homura?
...W-what’s with you, all of a sudden?

group_1.textRight: In order to help you seize victory, Sayaka,@I’ll try my very hardest.

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, hold on, why are you acting so@gung-ho about this, Homura?!

group_1.textRight: I-I want to cheer you on,@that’s why!

group_1.textLeft: That doesn’t explain your reason,@though?![chara:200450:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textRight: You want that concert ticket,@don’t you, Sayaka?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…k-kinda…@I mean, you’re not wrong, but…

group_1.textRight: Well then, I’ll help you out too! The@three of us will win the whole thing!
And if I remember correctly, apparently@participants have to be in teams of three.
And we have just that amount right here!
Let’s all three of us do our best,@Sayaka!

group_1.textLeft: H-hold on now…

group_1.textRight: Ah, it’s a special occasion, so@why don't we go in formal kimono?
The event is hosted at Mizuna Shrine, so we@should pay a visit while we’re there!

group_1.textLeft: (H-how did it end up like this…?!)
(Oh well… Kyosuke can always just go@with someone in his family…)
(And worrying about this or that is@pointless until we actually win.)
(Besides…)
(Those two are getting this fired up,@all for my sake…)
Sure…gotcha.
However we get there,@let’s all aim for the top!

group_1.narration: On the day of the calligraphy event@we looked forward to,
the three of us met at the Mizuna@Shrine’s assembly area…@However...

group_1.textLeft: There sure are a lot of people participating,@all things considered…

group_1.textRight: There are too many people,@it feels like my head is spinning…

group_1.textLeft: Homura, are you okay?!

group_1.textCenter: (Those two sure are hell-bent on going@through with this, but…)
(I wonder…can we really win this thing…?)
